title.rendered: Sidekicks Fiverr Workspace Chief Operators Can Be For Freelancers

content.rendered:
Let’s be honest, everyone needs a sidekick.Who wouldn’t want a loyal companion to help you navigate sticky situations, dangerous twists and turns, and tax season!?And in a freelancer’s case, that’s an app that’ll make your business easier.
Your Fiverr Workspace Chief Operator is armed and ready to tackle the ups and downs of freelancing life with you in app form. No one is better equipped to be your sidekick than your personal CO, because they’ve learned from some of the best sidekicks of all time (not to mention how we blend smart tech and real human experience in our NYC office)! Here are just some of their most notable inspirations:

Alan Parrish (Jumanji)

via GIPHYWhen a lion comes flying out of a board game, the only person you want by your side is Alan Parrish. Why? Because he’s been in the jungle for most of his life and has learned the ways of the wild! Your Fiverr Workspace Chief Operator knows the freelance jungle inside-out. While there aren’t vicious monkeys or deathly vines in the freelance jungle, there are tax pit-falls and time-tracking nightmares. So let them help you when it’s your time to roll the dice! Pick up the app and live a less cluttered freelance life.

Robin

via GIPHYBatman couldn’t do what he does without the help of his boy wonder! Your personal CO is here to make you feel invincible, so you can get on with saving the world (or your client’s Excel spreadsheet!) Like the original Robin, Dick Grayson, your CO is a master of navigating even the most hair-raising scenarios. Except, instead of flying through the air in a multi-color spandex suit, they are just a button push away in your app. Same thing, right?

Barb (Stranger Things)

via GIPHYOh Barb! Barb is everyone’s rock, their voice of reason, and their reality check. The Fiverr Workspace Chief Officer is the Barb of the freelance world. Without even trying, they know exactly what to say and will stick with you through thick and thin. They’re here to guide you through the upside-down world of invoicing, so you don’t get overwhelmed and end up communicating to your clients using only Christmas lights.
Heads up, your CO wants no part of the demogorgon either.

Chewbacca (Star Wars)

via GIPHYWe might not be able to understand what Chewbacca is saying, but he’s always right. Your personal CO is fluent in the complex assignments and tax deductible questions that can often leave us feeling intimidated and confused. When you’re too busy working to decrypt all of that complicated tax lingo, your CO will be there to do it for you (and they’ll help kill all of those pesky storm troopers too. Bonus!)

Aladdin’s Genie

via GIPHYHaving an Fiverr Workspace Chief Operator for your freelance business might make you feel like you’ve rubbed a lamp and a genie popped out! Trying to keep track of business expenses is always a struggle, which is why your personal CO is there to file them for you! They might not be a real genie, but when your freelance business run smoothly it can feel like magic!

@graph.name: Georgia Dolenz
@graph.description: Georgia is a writer and actress based in Los Angeles. She originally hails from England, where she gained a degree in Theatre and an accent. Georgia has been known to write sketch comedy, online blogs, animated shorts and sarcasm. She is currently writing and performing in the Sunday Company at the Groundlings, and can weld if need be.
